title: Surreal Ambient Soundscapes Vol. 2
description: The second version from a collection of surreal ambient soundscapes, perfect for creating an abstract, mystical and oblivious atmosphere in Fantasy, Post Apocalyptic or Space games. Contains 100 different soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/surreal-ambient-soundscapes-vol-2

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0hloth22gennb4k/MSE%20-%20Surreal%20Ambient%20Soundscapes%20Vol.%202.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 100 different ambient soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.


These ambient soundscapes work great as a background, they will help you tell a story, increase or decrease tension, fill the atmosphere in game scenes. They can also be used for the background in the menu. You can mix and match these soundscapes with each other to create extra variation.


Use this asset to create an ethereal and fantasy atmosphere in your locations and worlds, be it a strange alien place, an uncharted planet, an eternal infinity, an inexhaustible life, an endless maze with lost souls or a forgotten place.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 100 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, space, horror, post-apocalyptic, science fiction and more


Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 150 minutes 00 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
